GOD.content: Matthew’s “to be learned by heart,” what is the heart, should it return to its correct place?: l’emplacement juste du coeur, c’est le lieu du meilleur placement ——heart is where you save real treasure, a capital beyond the terrestrial, the visible, an incorruptible capital, most secure, infinite profit
GOD.linkedContent: Matthew’s “to be learned by heart,” what is the heart, should it return to its correct place?: l’emplacement juste du coeur, c’est le lieu du meilleur placement ——heart is where you save real treasure, a capital beyond the terrestrial, the visible, an incorruptible capital, most secure, infinite profit

GT.content: Heidegger: to look ahead (vorblicken) to the It (Es) which gives (gibt) Being (Sein) & time (Zeit), we try to bring the It and its Being into view, capitalize the “It”, become foresighted
GT.linkedContent: Heidegger: to look ahead (vorblicken) to the It (Es) which gives (gibt) Being (Sein) & time (Zeit), we try to bring the It and its Being into view, capitalize the “It”, become foresighted

GT.content: madness linked to double bind as the bind & the non-bind or débandade: folie de la garde ou de la capitalisation hypermnésique, et folie de la dépense oublieuse; eats away at language, burns up word or meaning of “gift,” spreads its ashes w/out return; that which does not return to the father
GT.linkedContent: madness linked to double bind as the bind & the non-bind or débandade: folie de la garde ou de la capitalisation hypermnésique, et folie de la dépense oublieuse; eats away at language, burns up word or meaning of “gift,” spreads its ashes w/out return; that which does not return to the father

GT.content: this is perhaps counterfeit money: this perhaps is the intentional dimension[?], the credit, the act of faith that structures all money
GT.linkedContent: this is perhaps counterfeit money: this perhaps is the intentional dimension[?], the credit, the act of faith that structures all money

GT.content: Baudelaire’s “Counterfeit Money,” its play w/ title, links literature to belief, credit, thus capital, economy, politics
GT.linkedContent: Baudelaire’s “Counterfeit Money,” its play w/ title, links literature to belief, credit, thus capital, economy, politics

GT.content: a “true” corpus is still, perhaps, counterfeit money, may be ghost or spirit, spirit of body & of capital (title, heading, is capital), no problem of canon if this institution were natural
GT.linkedContent: a “true” corpus is still, perhaps, counterfeit money, may be ghost or spirit, spirit of body & of capital (title, heading, is capital), no problem of canon if this institution were natural

GT.content: Mallarmé links aesthetics w/ political economy via alchemy: alchemy as precursor to political economy, “null stone, dreaming of gold, once called philosophical…foreshadows, in finance, the future credit, preceding capital or reducing it to the humility of money!”
GT.linkedContent: Mallarmé links aesthetics w/ political economy via alchemy: alchemy as precursor to political economy, “null stone, dreaming of gold, once called philosophical…foreshadows, in finance, the future credit, preceding capital or reducing it to the humility of money!”

GT.content: writing subject does not have to be giving subject; subject as such: bordered, posed, identified, always calculates, reappropriates surplus-value, circular return, a certain capitalization
GT.linkedContent: writing subject does not have to be giving subject; subject as such: bordered, posed, identified, always calculates, reappropriates surplus-value, circular return, a certain capitalization

GT.content: despite labor of subject, production of surplus-value, gift takes place where there’s trace, dissemination, in excessive forgetting, forgetful excess of the gift
GT.linkedContent: despite labor of subject, production of surplus-value, gift takes place where there’s trace, dissemination, in excessive forgetting, forgetful excess of the gift

GT.content: literature & its relation to capital, city, polis, transformation of monetary forms [late capitalism] (dematerializaiton of money & all the scenes that depend on it)
GT.linkedContent: literature & its relation to capital, city, polis, transformation of monetary forms [late capitalism] (dematerializaiton of money & all the scenes that depend on it)

GT.content: isn’t counterfeit money the truth of capital? everything that depends on faith & credit?
GT.linkedContent: isn’t counterfeit money the truth of capital? everything that depends on faith & credit?

GT.content: Baudelaire’s future: a good sense that will condemn everything except money
GT.linkedContent: Baudelaire’s future: a good sense that will condemn everything except money

GT.content: capitalize, profit on poverty and beggar index, poverty becomes capitalizable credit [Nietzsche’s slave morality]
GT.linkedContent: capitalize, profit on poverty and beggar index, poverty becomes capitalizable credit [Nietzsche’s slave morality]

GT.content: chremastics vs. economy: 1) chremastics, ovular or seminal capital, “bad infinite” of money, no limit 2) economy, oikos, care for home, hearth, limited to necessary goods
GT.linkedContent: chremastics vs. economy: 1) chremastics, ovular or seminal capital, “bad infinite” of money, no limit 2) economy, oikos, care for home, hearth, limited to necessary goods

GT.content: limit gets blurred once there’s monetary sign, or simply sign, once there’s differance & credit, family no longer contained > this originary ruin is chance of hospitality—like counterfeit money, chance for gift itself [Aristotle looks for balanced limit, not Derrida]
GT.linkedContent: limit gets blurred once there’s monetary sign, or simply sign, once there’s differance & credit, family no longer contained > this originary ruin is chance of hospitality—like counterfeit money, chance for gift itself [Aristotle looks for balanced limit, not Derrida]

GT.content: the Good, in Republic, takes on features of father and of Capital, [Derrida’s fn references Dissemination, on bad faith of fraudulent merchandise, tampering w/ money, & on political economy] whereas Baudelaire is interested in copy of copy, phantasm
GT.linkedContent: the Good, in Republic, takes on features of father and of Capital, [Derrida’s fn references Dissemination, on bad faith of fraudulent merchandise, tampering w/ money, & on political economy] whereas Baudelaire is interested in copy of copy, phantasm

MONL.content: people must yield to the homo-hegemony of dominant languages, the languages of masters, capital, machine
MONL.linkedContent: people must yield to the homo-hegemony of dominant languages, the languages of masters, capital, machine

LOBL.content: apocalyptic, in other words capital unveiling [from GLAS]

AF.content: archival violence: exergue, capitalize on ellipse, accumulates capital in advance, anticipates so to institute (Gewalt)
AF.linkedContent: archival violence: exergue, capitalize on ellipse, accumulates capital in advance, anticipates so to institute (Gewalt)

AF.content: archive at once institutive & conservative [see FL], revolutionary & traditional, an eco-nomic archive: keeps, puts in reserve, saves, but in unnatural fashion (forcing obedience to law)
AF.linkedContent: archive at once institutive & conservative [see FL], revolutionary & traditional, an eco-nomic archive: keeps, puts in reserve, saves, but in unnatural fashion (forcing obedience to law)

AF.content: death drive is archive fever, not a principle, aneconomy, threatens every principality, every archontic primacy, every archival desire: its silent vocation > burn the archive, incite amnesia, ruin archive as accumulation and capitalization of memory
AF.linkedContent: death drive is archive fever, not a principle, aneconomy, threatens every principality, every archontic primacy, every archival desire: its silent vocation > burn the archive, incite amnesia, ruin archive as accumulation and capitalization of memory

AF.content: Jew (or Devil, radical evil, all which is irreconcilable to God in “Christian science”) can be reinvested as an economistic resource of an archive that capitalizes everything [Sagi]
AF.linkedContent: Jew (or Devil, radical evil, all which is irreconcilable to God in “Christian science”) can be reinvested as an economistic resource of an archive that capitalizes everything [Sagi]

AF.content: devil can justify, such is destination of Jew in Aryan ideal
AF.linkedContent: devil can justify, such is destination of Jew in Aryan ideal

AF.content: lawmakers w/out which one can’t have archives, conservation (memory) puts into reserve (“store”), accumulates, capitalizes, stocks a quasi-infinity of layers (hypermnesic, hypomnesic epidermises of books & penises)
AF.linkedContent: lawmakers w/out which one can’t have archives, conservation (memory) puts into reserve (“store”), accumulates, capitalizes, stocks a quasi-infinity of layers (hypermnesic, hypomnesic epidermises of books & penises)

POO.content: capitale (head on), problema (ob-subject, promontory cap, armor; excuse given to excuse oneself of blame), p. 137n cap as “front,” problem as diverted responsibility
POO.linkedContent: capitale (head on), problema (ob-subject, promontory cap, armor; excuse given to excuse oneself of blame), p. 137n cap as “front,” problem as diverted responsibility

SPOM.content: exappropriation is the radical contradiction of all “capital,” property and appropriation, as well as ideas that depend on it: i.e. free subjectivity: “servitude binds (itself) to appropriation” > l’exappropriation ne justifie aucune chaîne
SPOM.linkedContent: exappropriation is the radical contradiction of all “capital,” property and appropriation, as well as ideas that depend on it: i.e. free subjectivity: “servitude binds (itself) to appropriation” > l’exappropriation ne justifie aucune chaîne

SPOM.content: once revolutionary task sets in, amnesia occurs, nothing but forgetting, “anachrony practices and promises forgetting”
SPOM.linkedContent: once revolutionary task sets in, amnesia occurs, nothing but forgetting, “anachrony practices and promises forgetting”

SPOM.content: question of head, cap-, spirit > amnesiac order of capitalist bourgeoisie, the muzzle (gueule) replaces head at summit
SPOM.linkedContent: question of head, cap-, spirit > amnesiac order of capitalist bourgeoisie, the muzzle (gueule) replaces head at summit

SPOM.content: Marx aims for head, for chief, for mask, for visor
SPOM.linkedContent: Marx aims for head, for chief, for mask, for visor

SPOM.content: Marx’s theory of ideology: the “second” ghost > incorporation of autonomized spirit [“first” ghost?], ideological (fetish) lent a borrowed body [see DEBT], second incarnation “conferred on an initial idealization,” a non-natural body, a technical body or an institutional body (helmet of ideologem or fetish under armor)
SPOM.linkedContent: Marx’s theory of ideology: the “second” ghost > incorporation of autonomized spirit [“first” ghost?], ideological (fetish) lent a borrowed body [see DEBT], second incarnation “conferred on an initial idealization,” a non-natural body, a technical body or an institutional body (helmet of ideologem or fetish under armor)

SPOM.content: that’s not all: specificity of process can still capitalize spectralization > the first ghost effect (autonomized spirit) can be incorporated, negated, integrated as one’s own human body
SPOM.linkedContent: that’s not all: specificity of process can still capitalize spectralization > the first ghost effect (autonomized spirit) can be incorporated, negated, integrated as one’s own human body

SPOM.content: at the head, the capital representation: man, capital ghost (das Hauptgespenst) > if men exist in logic of abstract spirit, they are present in ghostly fashion, as specters
SPOM.linkedContent: at the head, the capital representation: man, capital ghost (das Hauptgespenst) > if men exist in logic of abstract spirit, they are present in ghostly fashion, as specters

SPOM.content: who’s head of the head (l’archi-specter, le fantôme capital) when ghosts are disseminated everywhere? qui mettre en tête parmi tous ceux qu’on se met en tête?
SPOM.linkedContent: who’s head of the head (l’archi-specter, le fantôme capital) when ghosts are disseminated everywhere? qui mettre en tête parmi tous ceux qu’on se met en tête?

SPOM.content: Marx feigns to count ghosts, they are innumberable, and there is but one ghost (already too many, i.e. supplements), it is # itself, the arch-specter as father as capital or Plato’s good [see Plato’s Republic 555e]
SPOM.linkedContent: Marx feigns to count ghosts, they are innumberable, and there is but one ghost (already too many, i.e. supplements), it is # itself, the arch-specter as father as capital or Plato’s good [see Plato’s Republic 555e]

SPOM.content: commodity haunts the thing, its specter travaille la valeur d’usage (at work in use-value), cette hantise se déplace comme la silhouette anonyme ou la figure d’un figurante qui pourrait être le personnage capital
SPOM.linkedContent: commodity haunts the thing, its specter travaille la valeur d’usage (at work in use-value), cette hantise se déplace comme la silhouette anonyme ou la figure d’un figurante qui pourrait être le personnage capital

SPOM.content: for Marx, capital contradiction, contradiction of automatic autonomy: 1) inert thing [table] appears inspired, has pneuma or psychē 2) remains caught in heavy thingness of hulē
SPOM.linkedContent: for Marx, capital contradiction, contradiction of automatic autonomy: 1) inert thing [table] appears inspired, has pneuma or psychē 2) remains caught in heavy thingness of hulē

SPOM.content: autonomy the mask of automatism, visor hides absence of living gaze, automaton mimes the living, Thing neither dead nor alive, it survives, war machine, theatrical machine, mekhanē
SPOM.linkedContent: autonomy the mask of automatism, visor hides absence of living gaze, automaton mimes the living, Thing neither dead nor alive, it survives, war machine, theatrical machine, mekhanē

POOF.content: the whole text has thought of Blanchot & Bataille, the “community w/ community,” w/out wanting to capitalize around them all their original thoughts
POOF.linkedContent: the whole text has thought of Blanchot & Bataille, the “community w/ community,” w/out wanting to capitalize around them all their original thoughts

POOF.content: who is the friend? beyond ego, presence, subject, etc.? distancing itself from all determinations? beyond the brother who capitalizes everything? > this a political question—will there be loud protests (by militants of a dogmatic humanism) if to think & live gentle rigor of friendship would be the law of friendship qua an experience of ahumanity?
POOF.linkedContent: who is the friend? beyond ego, presence, subject, etc.? distancing itself from all determinations? beyond the brother who capitalizes everything? > this a political question—will there be loud protests (by militants of a dogmatic humanism) if to think & live gentle rigor of friendship would be the law of friendship qua an experience of ahumanity?

POOF.content: via Deguy, Aristotle overtook to ruin the capital letters of Platonism, the eídos of friendship, by calling the witness to the stand, an “actual” friend > Derrida will take sign of this ruin & no longer answer call to witness stand
POOF.linkedContent: via Deguy, Aristotle overtook to ruin the capital letters of Platonism, the eídos of friendship, by calling the witness to the stand, an “actual” friend > Derrida will take sign of this ruin & no longer answer call to witness stand

VM.content: community of questions: unrelentingly ask questions, despite diaspora of institutes, despite publications & techniques that follow, accumulating themselves like capital or poverty
VM.linkedContent: community of questions: unrelentingly ask questions, despite diaspora of institutes, despite publications & techniques that follow, accumulating themselves like capital or poverty

VM.content: [for Levinas, against ontology, primacy > archia > chief > neutral]
VM.linkedContent: [for Levinas, against ontology, primacy > archia > chief > neutral]

PP.content: Plato’s Republic (555e): “one of the drawbacks of democracy” is way it lets capital foster drone and pauper element in state, harvesting interest from any remainder
PP.linkedContent: Plato’s Republic (555e): “one of the drawbacks of democracy” is way it lets capital foster drone and pauper element in state, harvesting interest from any remainder

PP.content: son as interest on capital investment, as return, revenue, son as physical sun, analogon of intelligible sun (the Good, capital, origin of all onta); father as noooumena, son as horōmena ——meaning of patēr sometimes exclusively financial capital
PP.linkedContent: son as interest on capital investment, as return, revenue, son as physical sun, analogon of intelligible sun (the Good, capital, origin of all onta); father as noooumena, son as horōmena ——meaning of patēr sometimes exclusively financial capital

PP.content: dialectical inversion of pharmakon or dangerous supplement makes death à la fois acceptable and null > immortality of soul, acts like antibody, dissipates its terrifying fantasy, le pharmarkon inverti, qui met en fuite tous les épouvantails: origin of epistēmē, opening to truth as possibility of repetition, submission of “greed for life (epithumein zēn)” to law (king, father, chief, capital)
PP.linkedContent: dialectical inversion of pharmakon or dangerous supplement makes death à la fois acceptable and null > immortality of soul, acts like antibody, dissipates its terrifying fantasy, le pharmarkon inverti, qui met en fuite tous les épouvantails: origin of epistēmē, opening to truth as possibility of repetition, submission of “greed for life (epithumein zēn)” to law (king, father, chief, capital)

PP.content: temperance, the best pharmakon, the capital cure, when a pharmakon is remedy not drug
PP.linkedContent: temperance, the best pharmakon, the capital cure, when a pharmakon is remedy not drug

OH.content: “cap” (caput, capitis), the head, extremity of the extreme, last legs, final moment (eschaton > telos); captain (not a woman); eschatology and teleology—that is man
OH.linkedContent: “cap” (caput, capitis), the head, extremity of the extreme, last legs, final moment (eschaton > telos); captain (not a woman); eschatology and teleology—that is man

OH.content: heading of the other: first condition of an identity that is not an egocentrism destructive of oneself and the other, not even anti-heading or decapitation
OH.linkedContent: heading of the other: first condition of an identity that is not an egocentrism destructive of oneself and the other, not even anti-heading or decapitation

OH.content: keep the heading (garder le cap) > because absolutely new might bring ghost of the worst
OH.linkedContent: keep the heading (garder le cap) > because absolutely new might bring ghost of the worst

OH.content: must be suspicious of repetitive memory and tout autre of absolutely new [cf. POOF p. 65], of anamnestic capitalization & amnesic exposure to what would no longer be identifiable
OH.linkedContent: must be suspicious of repetitive memory and tout autre of absolutely new [cf. POOF p. 65], of anamnestic capitalization & amnesic exposure to what would no longer be identifiable

OH.content: Europe: representation or figure of a universal idea; has confused its face, figure, w/ a point, a phallus; the idea of an advanced point of exemplarity is the idea of the European idea, eidos, archē, telos, the idea of beginning, commanding, cap, captain, towards an accomplished end
OH.linkedContent: Europe: representation or figure of a universal idea; has confused its face, figure, w/ a point, a phallus; the idea of an advanced point of exemplarity is the idea of the European idea, eidos, archē, telos, the idea of beginning, commanding, cap, captain, towards an accomplished end

OH.content: advanced point is at once beginning and end, divided as beginning and end (Heidegger on Ort as point of spear, and fromm, Frömmigkeit, from promos, what leads, l’avant-garde)
OH.linkedContent: advanced point is at once beginning and end, divided as beginning and end (Heidegger on Ort as point of spear, and fromm, Frömmigkeit, from promos, what leads, l’avant-garde)

OH.content: identification is always cultural never natural, always has a capital form, advanced point, capitalizing reserve
OH.linkedContent: identification is always cultural never natural, always has a capital form, advanced point, capitalizing reserve

OH.content: we did not choose this responsibility of our heritage [it is from the other, the language of our language], nor the capitalizing memory we have of it
OH.linkedContent: we did not choose this responsibility of our heritage [it is from the other, the language of our language], nor the capitalizing memory we have of it

OH.content: for Valéry, capital belongs to series of Europe’s phenomenal manifestations
OH.linkedContent: for Valéry, capital belongs to series of Europe’s phenomenal manifestations

OH.content: vis-à-vis Valéry, what has not yet happened in history: the capital event of a concept, which would be to think the event as such > the capital event is also the event of capital, the head
OH.linkedContent: vis-à-vis Valéry, what has not yet happened in history: the capital event of a concept, which would be to think the event as such > the capital event is also the event of capital, the head

OH.content: call to betray a certain order of capital is taking place now, in an act of memory faithful to the other heading
OH.linkedContent: call to betray a certain order of capital is taking place now, in an act of memory faithful to the other heading

OH.content: crisis is not appropriate word any more for event of other heading: crisis [krinein, moment of decision] has always inspired a Selbstbesinnung (self-contemplation), a regaining of “direction (sens)” > protestant, capital discourse
OH.linkedContent: crisis is not appropriate word any more for event of other heading: crisis [krinein, moment of decision] has always inspired a Selbstbesinnung (self-contemplation), a regaining of “direction (sens)” > protestant, capital discourse

OH.content: capital as cutting edge of progress (à la pointe du progrès), universalizing model, everyone joins at the head
OH.linkedContent: capital as cutting edge of progress (à la pointe du progrès), universalizing model, everyone joins at the head

OH.content: “capillarities” (new media, techno-scientific powers): centralizing pulsions don’t always go through states anymore
OH.linkedContent: “capillarities” (new media, techno-scientific powers): centralizing pulsions don’t always go through states anymore

OH.content: question of capital, question of hegemonic centrality
OH.linkedContent: question of capital, question of hegemonic centrality

OH.content: new topology re: capital, no longer linked to polis, “quasi-political”
OH.linkedContent: new topology re: capital, no longer linked to polis, “quasi-political”

OH.content: double bind of European cultural identity: 1) necessary not to reconstitute centralizing hegemony (the capital) 2) necessary not to cultivate minority differences for their sake, untranslatable idiolects (not to multiply borders, marges, marches)
OH.linkedContent: double bind of European cultural identity: 1) necessary not to reconstitute centralizing hegemony (the capital) 2) necessary not to cultivate minority differences for their sake, untranslatable idiolects (not to multiply borders, marges, marches)

OH.content: alliance of capital and a-capital (the other of capital): this seems impossible, it is, such is the nature of all responsibility
OH.linkedContent: alliance of capital and a-capital (the other of capital): this seems impossible, it is, such is the nature of all responsibility

OH.content: Europe advances itself as heading for universal essence of man > to advance oneself: to name oneself, rush out ahead, in front, anticipate, launch, stick one’s neck out, to love or to violate, to love to violate, to colonize, colonize itself
OH.linkedContent: Europe advances itself as heading for universal essence of man > to advance oneself: to name oneself, rush out ahead, in front, anticipate, launch, stick one’s neck out, to love or to violate, to love to violate, to colonize, colonize itself

OH.content: word “capital,” like “cap,” like “culture,” like “colo,” in “colony” and “colonization,” like “civilization,” is Latin word
OH.linkedContent: word “capital,” like “cap,” like “culture,” like “colo,” in “colony” and “colonization,” like “civilization,” is Latin word

OH.content: Valéry: capital would consume Frenchmen w/ “concentration camp” of jealousy
OH.linkedContent: Valéry: capital would consume Frenchmen w/ “concentration camp” of jealousy

OH.content: have courage for a new critique of capital that avoids Marxist intimidation
OH.linkedContent: have courage for a new critique of capital that avoids Marxist intimidation

OH.content: via Valéry, most interesting moment of rhetorical capitalization of “capital” (its hierarchization): regional capital always calls for always threatened universal capital
OH.linkedContent: via Valéry, most interesting moment of rhetorical capitalization of “capital” (its hierarchization): regional capital always calls for always threatened universal capital

OH.content: Valéry: “our body”—best known capital, gives capital its most literal/proper meaning
OH.linkedContent: Valéry: “our body”—best known capital, gives capital its most literal/proper meaning

OH.content: [threatened] ideality in capitalization: that which exceeds borders of sensible, opens onto infinite, gives rise to universal, “maxim of maximization,” nothing other than spirit itself
OH.linkedContent: [threatened] ideality in capitalization: that which exceeds borders of sensible, opens onto infinite, gives rise to universal, “maxim of maximization,” nothing other than spirit itself

OH.content: via Valéry, people who read are responsible for, respond before, turn memory into “solid value,” create an absolute surplus value, increase of universal capital, “world’s wealth” increases
OH.linkedContent: via Valéry, people who read are responsible for, respond before, turn memory into “solid value,” create an absolute surplus value, increase of universal capital, “world’s wealth” increases

OH.content: value of universality capitalizes all antinomies, linked to value of exemplarity which inscribes universality in proper body of singularity (idiom or culture)
OH.linkedContent: value of universality capitalizes all antinomies, linked to value of exemplarity which inscribes universality in proper body of singularity (idiom or culture)

OH.content: Valéry makes analogy btwn spirit, value & capital [refers to Nietzsche]
OH.linkedContent: Valéry makes analogy btwn spirit, value & capital [refers to Nietzsche]

OH.content: Valéry: the word “spirit” > first commerce of the world [logocentrism]
OH.linkedContent: Valéry: the word “spirit” > first commerce of the world [logocentrism]

VP.content: the more the signifier is ideal, more it augments potency of repetition of presence, the more it protects, preserves, reserves and capitalizes on sense
VP.linkedContent: the more the signifier is ideal, more it augments potency of repetition of presence, the more it protects, preserves, reserves and capitalizes on sense

WM.content: metaphor of (the) usure (of metaphor): the ruining of figure; usure as erasure, rubbing out, and usure as increasing return in the form of revenue, surplus value, supplementary capital
WM.linkedContent: metaphor of (the) usure (of metaphor): the ruining of figure; usure as erasure, rubbing out, and usure as increasing return in the form of revenue, surplus value, supplementary capital

WM.content: la figure sensible qui s’abrite et qui s’use, jusqu’à paraître inaperçue, dans chaque concept métaphysique
WM.linkedContent: la figure sensible qui s’abrite et qui s’use, jusqu’à paraître inaperçue, dans chaque concept métaphysique

DS.content: title—capital: carries its head too high, raises its voice, drowns out ensuing text
DS.linkedContent: title—capital: carries its head too high, raises its voice, drowns out ensuing text

DS.content: what ruins the “pious capital letter,” the aplomb of the heading: the blanks, ordered return of white spaces, measure & order of dissemination, law of spacing, rhythmos, invisible fleuron
DS.linkedContent: what ruins the “pious capital letter,” the aplomb of the heading: the blanks, ordered return of white spaces, measure & order of dissemination, law of spacing, rhythmos, invisible fleuron

DS.content: [Derrida comes back to i] reads little point as a decapitation right next to castrated pike > capital I (disseminates unity of meaning), ego, ice, écho—plus-je > (I + Dé)irisation
DS.linkedContent: [Derrida comes back to i] reads little point as a decapitation right next to castrated pike > capital I (disseminates unity of meaning), ego, ice, écho—plus-je > (I + Dé)irisation

POS.content: [Derrida lists texts where to find] false departures, beginnings, titles, epigraphs, fictive pretexts: decapitations
POS.linkedContent: [Derrida lists texts where to find] false departures, beginnings, titles, epigraphs, fictive pretexts: decapitations

P.content: analogism saturates hiatus by repetition: mise en abyme resists the abyss of collapse, reconstitutes economy of mimesis (economimesis), l’analogisme recapitule ou recapite
P.linkedContent: analogism saturates hiatus by repetition: mise en abyme resists the abyss of collapse, reconstitutes economy of mimesis (economimesis), l’analogisme recapitule ou recapite

ROP.content: ash, stepping beyond psychoanalysis, radical destruction of archive, destroys capitalizing reserve, the guarding of repression
ROP.linkedContent: ash, stepping beyond psychoanalysis, radical destruction of archive, destroys capitalizing reserve, the guarding of repression

ROP.content: via Foucault, doctor capitalizes/speculates on secret, capital of secret, the secrecy effect, technique of the secret, secret of secret: make one suppose knowledge and believe in the secret, attributes of Evil Genius attributed to doctor, he uses unreason, uses fiction/simulacrum
ROP.linkedContent: via Foucault, doctor capitalizes/speculates on secret, capital of secret, the secrecy effect, technique of the secret, secret of secret: make one suppose knowledge and believe in the secret, attributes of Evil Genius attributed to doctor, he uses unreason, uses fiction/simulacrum

SP.content: [re: truth-castration as man’s affair, and woman’s suspension of it] [English translation seems horrible] Derrida is asking that we take off the head (décapitonner) of Lacan’s discourse, w/ its truth speaking, castration & phallocentrism > by deploying metaphorics of veil
SP.linkedContent: [re: truth-castration as man’s affair, and woman’s suspension of it] [English translation seems horrible] Derrida is asking that we take off the head (décapitonner) of Lacan’s discourse, w/ its truth speaking, castration & phallocentrism > by deploying metaphorics of veil

SP.content: la signature et le texte tombent l’un hors de l’autre, se sécrètent, se séparent, et s’excrètent, se forment de la coupure même qui les décapite, les échafaude en tronc sans tête, dès l’instant de leur itérabilité > expropriative commencement marks everything erected w/ structure of etron [fecal matter]
SP.linkedContent: la signature et le texte tombent l’un hors de l’autre, se sécrètent, se séparent, et s’excrètent, se forment de la coupure même qui les décapite, les échafaude en tronc sans tête, dès l’instant de leur itérabilité > expropriative commencement marks everything erected w/ structure of etron [fecal matter]

DIF.content: the capital “a” of differance, a pyramid [A]; Hegel: body of sign is Egyptian pyramid > Derrida moves from pyramid to tomb, oikēsis > tomb of proper, familial residence, economy of death (this stone announces death of tyrant [cf. TN.]) [this tomb can’t even be made to resonate]
DIF.linkedContent: the capital “a” of differance, a pyramid [A]; Hegel: body of sign is Egyptian pyramid > Derrida moves from pyramid to tomb, oikēsis > tomb of proper, familial residence, economy of death (this stone announces death of tyrant [cf. TN.]) [this tomb can’t even be made to resonate]

DIF.content: differance not announced by capital letter, it subverts all kingdoms > everything w/in us that wants a kingdom (le royaume) (that wants to capitalize) fears differance
DIF.linkedContent: differance not announced by capital letter, it subverts all kingdoms > everything w/in us that wants a kingdom (le royaume) (that wants to capitalize) fears differance

DIF.content: to know there’s nothing kerygmatic [not a master-name] about differance, we must perceive its decapita(liza)tion > must put into question the name of the name
DIF.linkedContent: to know there’s nothing kerygmatic [not a master-name] about differance, we must perceive its decapita(liza)tion > must put into question the name of the name

O.content: absolute knowledge present at 0 point of philosophical exposition: saturate text w/ meaning (sens), teleologically equate it [the text?] w/ its (sa) conceptual tenor
O.linkedContent: absolute knowledge present at 0 point of philosophical exposition: saturate text w/ meaning (sens), teleologically equate it [the text?] w/ its (sa) conceptual tenor

O.content: point of ontotheological fusion reduces precipitation & after-affect (dehiscence btwn vouloir-dire & writing, anticipation & recapitulation) to sublatables [mouvement de tête]
O.linkedContent: point of ontotheological fusion reduces precipitation & after-affect (dehiscence btwn vouloir-dire & writing, anticipation & recapitulation) to sublatables [mouvement de tête]

O.content: effect of dissemination: lose one’s head, not know where it is
O.linkedContent: effect of dissemination: lose one’s head, not know where it is

O.content: return of theological seed to itself, dispersion working for profit of Idea, exclusion as inclusion [not Hegel’s Jew?] > la vérité qui se parle dans le cercle logocentrique, c’est le discours de ce qui revient au père
O.linkedContent: return of theological seed to itself, dispersion working for profit of Idea, exclusion as inclusion [not Hegel’s Jew?] > la vérité qui se parle dans le cercle logocentrique, c’est le discours de ce qui revient au père

WAP.content: title only has meaning virtual sentences (phrases) could give it, it gets its authority (both silent and intarissable) by capitalizing (summoning/repressing) on these virtualities
WAP.linkedContent: title only has meaning virtual sentences (phrases) could give it, it gets its authority (both silent and intarissable) by capitalizing (summoning/repressing) on these virtualities

WAP.content: one risks repeating Kant more naively, efficiently, clandestinely if one simply tries to skirt him (his philosophemes irrigate discourse underground)—can this paradoxical effect of capitalization be avoided?
WAP.linkedContent: one risks repeating Kant more naively, efficiently, clandestinely if one simply tries to skirt him (his philosophemes irrigate discourse underground)—can this paradoxical effect of capitalization be avoided?

WAP.content: heritage always surreptitiously bequeaths to us the means of interpreting it
WAP.linkedContent: heritage always surreptitiously bequeaths to us the means of interpreting it

WAP.content: [re: Hegel] are children insured against death of their father (capital, revenue) still children? or, haven't they always been insured? [same for widow who can count on revenues]
WAP.linkedContent: [re: Hegel] are children insured against death of their father (capital, revenue) still children? or, haven't they always been insured? [same for widow who can count on revenues]

DPi.content: w/out title, head (chef), capital: a text is an outlaw, decapitated (w/ neither head nor tail [PP p. 79])
DPi.linkedContent: w/out title, head (chef), capital: a text is an outlaw, decapitated (w/ neither head nor tail [PP p. 79])

DPi.content: capital punishment along w/ debate on capital, period, one of best entry points to think mondialisation (not globalisation) (refers to monde of Christian thought)
DPi.linkedContent: capital punishment along w/ debate on capital, period, one of best entry points to think mondialisation (not globalisation) (refers to monde of Christian thought)

DPi.content: the Latin interest: 1) finding oneself being btwn space larger than oneself 2) fiduciary calculation, surplus value, search for profit/capitalization, monetary or psychological economy
DPi.linkedContent: the Latin interest: 1) finding oneself being btwn space larger than oneself 2) fiduciary calculation, surplus value, search for profit/capitalization, monetary or psychological economy

DPi.content: damnum, via Benveniste, money given w/out return, given for nothing > excess of compelled expenditure pays more than is due, marks double law of homogeneity/proportionality btwn damage/punishment & their incalculable heterogeneity: the condemned/damned pays what he owes and does something tout autre, infinitely more than acquit himself of calculable debt: there is economy/aneconomy > “unless it is a matter of reimbursement (indemnification) and interest as the incalculable surplus value of capital”
DPi.linkedContent: damnum, via Benveniste, money given w/out return, given for nothing > excess of compelled expenditure pays more than is due, marks double law of homogeneity/proportionality btwn damage/punishment & their incalculable heterogeneity: the condemned/damned pays what he owes and does something tout autre, infinitely more than acquit himself of calculable debt: there is economy/aneconomy > “unless it is a matter of reimbursement (indemnification) and interest as the incalculable surplus value of capital”

DPi.content: zone btwn capital of capital punishment (de-cap-itation) & capital of capitalism (capitalization) causes vertigo, relations murky, when calculating drive, interest of capital, is no longer calculable and becomes virtually infinite, when death w/out return is part of market there where it can’t be, where it ought to remain incalculable > theologico-political: phantasm of infinitization in heart of finitude
DPi.linkedContent: zone btwn capital of capital punishment (de-cap-itation) & capital of capitalism (capitalization) causes vertigo, relations murky, when calculating drive, interest of capital, is no longer calculable and becomes virtually infinite, when death w/out return is part of market there where it can’t be, where it ought to remain incalculable > theologico-political: phantasm of infinitization in heart of finitude

CHM.content: no history except of rationality/meaning: reappropriation of negativity—or forgets it (same thing) > history of truth, history of economy of negative: negativity not positive truth is the nonhistorical capital of history
CHM.linkedContent: no history except of rationality/meaning: reappropriation of negativity—or forgets it (same thing) > history of truth, history of economy of negative: negativity not positive truth is the nonhistorical capital of history

Gii.content: [re: Handwerk] w/out attunement to essence of wood, itself attuned to man’s dwelling: empty activity, commerce, taste for profit > (this is Heidegger’s hierarchy & evaluation)
Gii.linkedContent: [re: Handwerk] w/out attunement to essence of wood, itself attuned to man’s dwelling: empty activity, commerce, taste for profit > (this is Heidegger’s hierarchy & evaluation)

REST.content: whose shoes (whose feet) (the subject of reattachment): the capital subject of this contract [btwn Shapiro & Heidegger], they each have one piece of symbolon, share common interest
REST.linkedContent: whose shoes (whose feet) (the subject of reattachment): the capital subject of this contract [btwn Shapiro & Heidegger], they each have one piece of symbolon, share common interest

REST.content: when Shapiro says, “they are clearly pictures of the artist’s own shoes,” the copula (they are) couples the painted shoes to the painter’s feet, laces drawn out of picture, presupposes hole in canvas
REST.linkedContent: when Shapiro says, “they are clearly pictures of the artist’s own shoes,” the copula (they are) couples the painted shoes to the painter’s feet, laces drawn out of picture, presupposes hole in canvas

REST.content: 2 capitalized attributes: adequate model (real shoes) & adequate subject (Van Gogh)
REST.linkedContent: 2 capitalized attributes: adequate model (real shoes) & adequate subject (Van Gogh)

REST.content: dogmatic, precritical language: “real,” “proper,” “this is that,” evidently, clearly, his own > talk so loudly, price to pay to have the shoes, believe he is no stranger to the other
REST.linkedContent: dogmatic, precritical language: “real,” “proper,” “this is that,” evidently, clearly, his own > talk so loudly, price to pay to have the shoes, believe he is no stranger to the other

REST.content: for Heidegger, putting to work of truth, appears in the hors-d’usage, unlacing, destricturation, uselesness overloaded w/ value, augments it w/ surplus value in attaching it symbolically to its belonging > a capital difference, concerns head of subject (not proprietor subject but: the earth and the world, trait and attraction, [ontological difference?])
REST.linkedContent: for Heidegger, putting to work of truth, appears in the hors-d’usage, unlacing, destricturation, uselesness overloaded w/ value, augments it w/ surplus value in attaching it symbolically to its belonging > a capital difference, concerns head of subject (not proprietor subject but: the earth and the world, trait and attraction, [ontological difference?])

REST.content: real wearer-holder-proprietor-signatory [subject] of shoes > so much augmented capital: these meanings are added onto, not confused w/, one another
REST.linkedContent: real wearer-holder-proprietor-signatory [subject] of shoes > so much augmented capital: these meanings are added onto, not confused w/, one another

TR.content: not only accusation & judgment in confession, there’s the executioner (carrying out of the sentence): sentence endured in pleasure of writing, ambiguous enjoyment at heart of terrible, severe jubilation of inscription: one steps up to cashier right away to collect interest on a capital that will assume value only “sooner or later,” after my death, in my absence
TR.linkedContent: not only accusation & judgment in confession, there’s the executioner (carrying out of the sentence): sentence endured in pleasure of writing, ambiguous enjoyment at heart of terrible, severe jubilation of inscription: one steps up to cashier right away to collect interest on a capital that will assume value only “sooner or later,” after my death, in my absence

TR.content: band, ribbon, silk, double bind en soie, ringhband, phantasmatic body on which limited ink (finite reserve) is made to flow; ink remains modest but capitalizes, virtually lets flow
TR.linkedContent: band, ribbon, silk, double bind en soie, ringhband, phantasmatic body on which limited ink (finite reserve) is made to flow; ink remains modest but capitalizes, virtually lets flow

TR.content: Rousseau’s scene of virtual “sooner or later” remains fundamentally Christian
TR.linkedContent: Rousseau’s scene of virtual “sooner or later” remains fundamentally Christian

PJP.content: faux témoignage, contrefaçon; perhaps I have already lied by promising veracity (veracity not truth) > Western social contract capitalizes this perhaps in the act of perjury
PJP.linkedContent: faux témoignage, contrefaçon; perhaps I have already lied by promising veracity (veracity not truth) > Western social contract capitalizes this perhaps in the act of perjury

C.content: Derrida tries to preserve what he invests in word paradigm, a word that’s too much used, worn down (usé), on all sides—thus irreplaceable > what he invests in the word is assaulted by investments of other, from capital (interest & usury): its measure accumulates in surplus value
C.linkedContent: Derrida tries to preserve what he invests in word paradigm, a word that’s too much used, worn down (usé), on all sides—thus irreplaceable > what he invests in the word is assaulted by investments of other, from capital (interest & usury): its measure accumulates in surplus value

C.content: T.-C. outplayed the eidos of the model, played a trick, exemplarily, on paradigm in general, finished it off, reduces it to shrunken head of a little chief (tête réduite d’un petit chef)
C.linkedContent: T.-C. outplayed the eidos of the model, played a trick, exemplarily, on paradigm in general, finished it off, reduces it to shrunken head of a little chief (tête réduite d’un petit chef)

C.content: I am myself cartouche and cartouches(s) in the plural: “I” sign myself to death as soon as there’s the title, reduce myself to first heading, capital, shrunken head
C.linkedContent: I am myself cartouche and cartouches(s) in the plural: “I” sign myself to death as soon as there’s the title, reduce myself to first heading, capital, shrunken head

TN.content: lexicon of touch risks being ruined by abusive spending (dépense absuive) > an eschatological, postwar inflation (desperate call for new “era,” “provenance”) > apocalyptic symptomatology of “deconstruction of Christianity”: all we speak is “touching”
TN.linkedContent: lexicon of touch risks being ruined by abusive spending (dépense absuive) > an eschatological, postwar inflation (desperate call for new “era,” “provenance”) > apocalyptic symptomatology of “deconstruction of Christianity”: all we speak is “touching”

TN.content: Nancy, spending like a madman: ontologizes everything that comes down to “touching,” jusqu’à la ruine, les ressources, le crédit, le capital et les intérêts du transcendental-ontologique > reduces them [all resources/capital figures of touch] to monetary simulacrum
TN.linkedContent: Nancy, spending like a madman: ontologizes everything that comes down to “touching,” jusqu’à la ruine, les ressources, le crédit, le capital et les intérêts du transcendental-ontologique > reduces them [all resources/capital figures of touch] to monetary simulacrum

TN.content: Nancy: “touch” as limit of sense, and the limit of senses is to be taken in all senses, each of which breaks into (fait effraction) the other
TN.linkedContent: Nancy: “touch” as limit of sense, and the limit of senses is to be taken in all senses, each of which breaks into (fait effraction) the other

TN.content: Nancy knows better than to capitalize “the” sense of touch w/ any semantic capital > none of the senses are assured, even if it can be quoted in the stock market
TN.linkedContent: Nancy knows better than to capitalize “the” sense of touch w/ any semantic capital > none of the senses are assured, even if it can be quoted in the stock market

TN.content: Nancy: epopteia, sight accomplished, consummation of Mystery of Sense Certainty, phallic & cephalic
TN.linkedContent: Nancy: epopteia, sight accomplished, consummation of Mystery of Sense Certainty, phallic & cephalic

E.content: God furnishes the poet w/ his capital, gives him surplus value & means of giving surplus-value, God is a poet
E.linkedContent: God furnishes the poet w/ his capital, gives him surplus value & means of giving surplus-value, God is a poet

E.content: structure of economimesis has its analogon in the city: when poet isn’t writing, he’s just a man, must eat, receives subsidies from sun-king (sustaining labor force)
E.linkedContent: structure of economimesis has its analogon in the city: when poet isn’t writing, he’s just a man, must eat, receives subsidies from sun-king (sustaining labor force)

BSi.content: sovereign, the arkhē, capital, chief, king, who can lose his head, go mad
BSi.linkedContent: sovereign, the arkhē, capital, chief, king, who can lose his head, go mad

BSi.content: [têtu, entêté] essence itself as headstrong stubbornness in being, bêtise, pigheadedness (entêtement)? the marionette (other) in me I wish to condemn to death? > bêtise hits you over the head (tête), acephalic manner > bêtise not proper to man, but to all those capital beings w/ heads?
BSi.linkedContent: [têtu, entêté] essence itself as headstrong stubbornness in being, bêtise, pigheadedness (entêtement)? the marionette (other) in me I wish to condemn to death? > bêtise hits you over the head (tête), acephalic manner > bêtise not proper to man, but to all those capital beings w/ heads?

BSi.content: Valéry wagers on CAP: le cap Pensée; the high point (comble) of internal politics, a multipli-city of selves, when the excess that exceeds un-counts the other & outside > jealousy is always the hight point that completes me, supplements me because receives, welcomes, no longer chases out other in me: one only ever jealous of oneself, the selfsame > explains all the loves and wars (which take place btwn the same, the others as the same): as soon as there’s a double capitalized phallic erection (CAP, standing, being on a cape) here called Thought
BSi.linkedContent: Valéry wagers on CAP: le cap Pensée; the high point (comble) of internal politics, a multipli-city of selves, when the excess that exceeds un-counts the other & outside > jealousy is always the hight point that completes me, supplements me because receives, welcomes, no longer chases out other in me: one only ever jealous of oneself, the selfsame > explains all the loves and wars (which take place btwn the same, the others as the same): as soon as there’s a double capitalized phallic erection (CAP, standing, being on a cape) here called Thought

BSi.content: the World Trade Center as image of Valéry’s double capitalized phallic erection (jealous of themselves) > double turn makes one think of double tower (tour)
BSi.linkedContent: the World Trade Center as image of Valéry’s double capitalized phallic erection (jealous of themselves) > double turn makes one think of double tower (tour)

BSi.content: hardness of capital erection [CAP] turns woman into beast
sovereign, highest, most eminent capital or capitalization, monopolizes force/violence—Gewalt—gives reason in advance to force through right
BSi.linkedContent: sovereign, highest, most eminent capital or capitalization, monopolizes force/violence—Gewalt—gives reason in advance to force through right

BSi.content: does a snake have a head? [CAP vs. Face]
BSi.linkedContent: does a snake have a head? [CAP vs. Face]

BSi.content: exergue (ex-ergon)—like parergon, out of work that puts to work > but like capital too: makes work happen, comes at head (inscribe date)
BSi.linkedContent: exergue (ex-ergon)—like parergon, out of work that puts to work > but like capital too: makes work happen, comes at head (inscribe date)

BSi.content: Abrahamic commencements: 1) Bereshit, Genesis—animals before man 2) en arkhē en o logos, sovereign all-powerful creator of everything, Head, fiat of a logos producing zōē, light, phōs
BSi.linkedContent: Abrahamic commencements: 1) Bereshit, Genesis—animals before man 2) en arkhē en o logos, sovereign all-powerful creator of everything, Head, fiat of a logos producing zōē, light, phōs

SPEC.content: force of disappearance, of fort > capitalized pleasure (plaisir) (idealization) does w/out what it needs: one provides oneself w/ head of what one needs by doing w/out it (to have it)
SPEC.linkedContent: force of disappearance, of fort > capitalized pleasure (plaisir) (idealization) does w/out what it needs: one provides oneself w/ head of what one needs by doing w/out it (to have it)

SPEC.content: capital front [bobine (Ernst’s spool) as face, cap as head], where PP might be placed out of action > to rout a mastery, so one doesn’t just end up w/ one’s couriers, offspring, lieutenants
SPEC.linkedContent: capital front [bobine (Ernst’s spool) as face, cap as head], where PP might be placed out of action > to rout a mastery, so one doesn’t just end up w/ one’s couriers, offspring, lieutenants

SPEC.content: to describe structural necessity of borrowing as provisional/external fatality is classical logic [Freud often does this]: suspense is provisional, notes/coins must be guaranteed in final judgment
SPEC.linkedContent: to describe structural necessity of borrowing as provisional/external fatality is classical logic [Freud often does this]: suspense is provisional, notes/coins must be guaranteed in final judgment

FV.content: [re: Poe’s Purloined…] no neutralization possible when public corporation (société anonyme) of capital & desire inaugurates narration
FV.linkedContent: [re: Poe’s Purloined…] no neutralization possible when public corporation (société anonyme) of capital & desire inaugurates narration
